snippet: The Sudanese man, who had been working with the United Nations in Liberia, was the third patient to arrive in Germany in recent weeks for treatment, and the first to die.
lead_paragraph: The Sudanese man, who had been working with the United Nations in Liberia, was the third patient to arrive in Germany in recent weeks for treatment, and the first to die.

headline.main: Ebola Patient Dies in German Hospital
headline.print_headline: Ebola Patient Dies in German Hospital
